Package org.forgerock.openidm.util

Class DurationStatistics

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.util.DurationStatistics
public class DurationStatistics extends Object
Thread-safe statistics class for time-durations, that calculates accurate count, min, and max values, and approximate mean and standard-deviation, with minimal memory consumption and low-latency under thread-contention.

Online mean and standard-deviation are calculated using the B. P. Welford (1962) technique.

    • startNanoTime

      public static long startNanoTime()
      Gets a start-time, in nanoseconds, for the current thread. Calling thread must be the same thread used to call stopNanoTime(long).
      Returns:
      Start-time, in nanoseconds

    • stopNanoTime

      public void stopNanoTime(long startNanoTime)
      Calculates and records the time-duration, since startNanoTime() occurred in the current thread. Calling thread must be the same thread used to call startNanoTime().
      Parameters:
      startNanoTime - Start-time, in nanoseconds
